lines.flavourText: The Azmeri must never touch the Tears of Maji, lest Viridi weep.

lines.name: Replica Shroud of the Lightless
lines.flavourText:
"Eyes of black, three by three, staring ever darker into me..."
- Researcher Arn

lines.name: Farrul's Fur

explicitModifiers.text: Aspect of the Cat has no Reservation
Gain up to your maximum number of Frenzy and Power Charges when you gain Cat's Stealth
You have Phasing while you have Cat's Stealth

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Plains was the First of the Hunt
It was she who showed us that there is honour
in waiting in the shadows and picking your moment.

lines.name: Mask of the Stitched Demon

explicitModifiers.text: Strength provides no bonus to Maximum Life
Intelligence provides no inherent bonus to Maximum Mana
Regenerate 1% of Life per second per 500 Maximum Energy Shield
Your Energy Shield starts at zero

lines.flavourText:
From the flesh of the gods, Xibaqua was born.
From the carnage of Xibaqua, we were born.
It is our duty to return to the gods what was once theirs.

lines.name: Atziri's Splendour

implicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Vaal Skill Gems

lines.flavourText:
"When you have nothing to hide,
you have nothing to fear."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: The Iron Fortress

explicitModifiers.text: +1% Chance to Block Attack Damage per 50 Strength
Chance to Block Spell Damage is Unlucky

Strength's Damage Bonus instead grants 3% increased Melee
Physical Damage per 10 Strength

lines.flavourText:
"Stand steadfast in the face of destruction.
The Council cannot afford to falter."
- Mauritius, the Iron Heart

lines.name: Doryani's Prototype

explicitModifiers.text: Armour also applies to Lightning Damage taken from Hits
Lightning Resistance does not affect Lightning Damage taken
Nearby Enemies have Lightning Resistance equal to yours

lines.flavourText:
"This was the first step in some grand design, 
lost to the ages, now ours to decipher." 
- Dominus, High Templar

lines.name: Doppelgänger Guise

explicitModifiers.text: (40-60)% more Critical Strike Chance while Insane
Enemies Killed by your Hits are destroyed while Insane
(30-40)% less Physical and Chaos Damage Taken while Sane
Regenerate 10% Life over one second when Hit while Sane

lines.flavourText:
Within each of us exists a being of pure malice,
held back only by the lies we tell ourselves.

lines.name: The Snowblind Grace

explicitModifiers.text: Evasion Rating is increased by Overcapped Cold Resistance

lines.name: Wildwrap
lines.flavourText:
"Laws are for city folk.
Can't try a man for murder if you can't find him."
- Taruk, Last of the Wildmen

lines.name: Greed's Embrace
lines.flavourText:
Some would question if the risk was worth it.
The rest were already dead.

lines.name: Hyrri's Ire

explicitModifiers.text: (105-145) to (160-200) Added Cold Damage with Bow Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Hyrri loosed a barrage of arrows,
tipped with a poisoned hatred
only oppression can ferment.

lines.name: Incandescent Heart

explicitModifiers.text: (0.8-1)% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Gain (10-20)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
25% of Elemental Damage from Hits taken as Chaos Damage
Light Radius is based on Energy Shield instead of Life

lines.flavourText:
Only light may banish the shadows from this land
And the black lies wrapped around your heart

lines.name: The Brass Dome

explicitModifiers.text: Strength provides no bonus to Maximum Life
Take no Extra Damage from Critical Strikes

lines.flavourText: The turtle's shell one day becomes its tomb.

lines.name: Loreweave

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (4-10) to (14-36) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
When it comes to finding a use for surplus,
a rich man has within himself
boundless creativity.

lines.name: Crown of the Tyrant

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby Enemies have -10% to all Resistances
You and Nearby Allies have 64 to 96 added Fire Damage per Red Socket
You and Nearby Allies have 56 to 88 added Cold Damage per Green Socket
You and Nearby Allies have 16 to 144 added Lightning Damage per Blue Socket
You and Nearby Allies have 47 to 61 added Chaos Damage per White Socket

lines.flavourText:
You will know if your subjects follow you from fear
or respect when you have your first moment of weakness.
If it's the former, they will tear you into pieces like rabid dogs.

lines.name: The Queen's Hunger

explicitModifiers.text:
Trigger Level 20 Bone Offering, Flesh Offering or Spirit Offering every 5 seconds
Offering Skills Triggered this way also affect you
+3771 to Armour during Soul Gain Prevention
12% chance to Avoid Elemental Damage from Hits during Soul Gain Prevention
Regenerate 200 Energy Shield per second while a Rare or Unique Enemy is Nearby
Recover (38-40)% of Mana and Energy Shield when you Focus

lines.flavourText:
In their crimson nightmare, the Vaal are still sacrificing themselves to her glory and beauty. 
They stab their own hearts and cry out in ecstasy, only to rise again.

lines.name: The Eternity Shroud

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Glimpse of Eternity when Hit
Gain (3-5)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage per Shaper Item Equipped
Hits ignore Enemy Monster Chaos Resistance if all Equipped Items are Shaper Items

lines.flavourText: There can be no defence against the celestial siblings entropy and time.

lines.name: Sporeguard

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Contaminate when you Kill an Enemy
Enemies on Fungal Ground you Kill Explode, dealing 5% of their Life as Chaos Damage
You have Fungal Ground around you while stationary

lines.name: Expedition's End

explicitModifiers.text: Freeze Chilled Enemies as though dealing (50-100)% more Damage

lines.flavourText:
He may have returned from the frozen southern reaches,
but that doesn't mean he ever truly escaped them.

lines.name: Saqawal's Nest

explicitModifiers.text: (12-20)% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
100% increased Aspect of the Avian Buff Effect
Aspect of the Avian also grants Avian's Might and Avian's Flight to nearby Allies
+(120-150) to Evasion Rating and Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Sky was the Last of the First.
It was he who showed us that our limits are self-imposed,
that what we take for law may just be an illusion.

lines.name: Shavronne's Wrappings

explicitModifiers.text: 10% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge
Reflects 1 to 250 Lightning Damage to Melee Attackers
Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Shavronne's apparel became ever more extravagant
as her body and soul became ever more corrupted.

lines.name: Atziri's Splendour

implicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Vaal Skill Gems

lines.flavourText:
"When you have nothing to hide,
you have nothing to fear."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Perfidy

explicitModifiers.text: You can have two different Banners at the same time
Banners you are carrying gain 1 Stage on Melee Hit, up to 5 per second
War Banner has (102-200)% increased Adrenaline duration
Defiance Banner has (101-199)% increased Taunt duration
Dread Banner grants an additional +(2-4) to maximum Fortification when placing the Banner

lines.flavourText:
The Trickster God turned the very Day and Night against each other.
What hope have you?

lines.name: Inpulsa's Broken Heart

explicitModifiers.text: (20-50)% increased Damage if you have Shocked an Enemy Recently

Shocked Enemies you Kill Explode, dealing 5% of
their Life as Lightning Damage which cannot Shock

lines.flavourText:
Don't hesitate; bring death to all, conclusively and swiftly,
or they will give you the same treatment.

lines.name: Fleshcrafter

explicitModifiers.text:
Minions Convert 2% of their Maximum Life to Maximum Energy
Shield per 1% Chaos Resistance they have
Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Minions' Energy Shield
Minions have (50-100)% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge
While Minions have Energy Shield, their Hits Ignore Monster Elemental Resistances

lines.flavourText: Imbue the body with stolen spirit, hold the leash tight.

lines.name: The Ivory Tower

explicitModifiers.text: +30 to maximum Energy Shield per 100 Reserved Life
Regenerate 2% of Energy Shield per second
Chaos Damage is taken from Mana before Life

lines.flavourText: The mind is a filter through which anarchy becomes order.

lines.name: Atziri's Splendour

implicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Vaal Skill Gems

lines.flavourText:
"When you have nothing to hide,
you have nothing to fear."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Blunderbore

explicitModifiers.text: (50-75)% increased Effect of Shrine Buffs on you
You have Lesser Brutal Shrine Buff
You have Lesser Massive Shrine Buff

lines.flavourText: The giant cares not for the ants.

lines.name: Queen of the Forest

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Movement Speed per 600 Evasion Rating, up to 75%
-(50-40) Physical Damage taken from Hits by Animals

lines.flavourText:
Shedding away her regal past, 
she forged a new destiny. 
Sacrificing the ephemeral joys of man, 
she embraced the eternal grasp of nature. 
Seizing her one true wish, 
she found peace at last.

lines.name: Atziri's Splendour

implicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Vaal Skill Gems

lines.flavourText:
"When you have nothing to hide,
you have nothing to fear."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: The Admiral

explicitModifiers.text: (5-10)% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite
Elemental Damage you Deal with Hits is Resisted by lowest Elemental Resistance instead

lines.flavourText:
The Oriathans built their empire on naval mobility, which allowed
them to wage war wherever their enemy was weakest.

lines.name: Cloak of Defiance

explicitModifiers.text: 10% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life

lines.flavourText:
When the throat roars,
As eyes weep,
When the hand grips hard
With trembling fingers,
When belly twists
Yet legs stand strong,
That is the work
Of the Defiant Heart.

lines.name: Doedre's Skin

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Blasphemy

Grants Level 20 Summon Doedre's Effigy Skill
Socketed Hex Curse Skills are Triggered by Doedre's Effigy when Summoned
Hexes from Socketed Skills can apply 5 additional Curses

lines.flavourText:
As she was sentenced to death, Doedre was silent.
As she was tied to the stake, Doedre was silent.
As the flames licked away her life, Doedre was silent.
But Wraeclast had not heard the last of her.

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Night was the first explorer
It was she who first braved night's terrors
and found comfort in silence and solace.

lines.name: Craiceann's Carapace

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Crab Skill
Bleeding cannot be inflicted on you
+5 to Maximum number of Crab Barriers

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Deep was the First of All.
It was He who conquered the waves,
who stood guard as land rose from sea.

lines.name: Mask of the Spirit Drinker

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate (50-150) Life per second if you have at least (500-1500) Maximum Energy Shield
Your Energy Shield starts at zero

lines.name: Carcass Jack
lines.flavourText:
"...The discomfort shown by the others is amusing, but none
can deny that my work has made quite the splash..."
- Maligaro's Journal

lines.name: Daresso's Defiance

explicitModifiers.text: (0.4-0.6)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You lose all Endurance Charges when Hit
You gain an Endurance Charge on Kill
You gain Onslaught for 5 seconds per Endurance Charge when Hit

lines.flavourText:
"When your back is against the wall,
And your opponent is bleeding you dry,
There is only one appropriate response:
Unbridled, overwhelming violence."
- Daresso, the Sword King

50% increased Evasion Rating if you have been Hit Recently

lines.flavourText:
Do not hide your flaws, your cracks,
mend them, and display them proudly.
For it is these that set us apart.

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Death Aura when Equipped
1% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You take 450 Chaos Damage per second for 3 seconds on Kill

lines.flavourText:
Tears of blood, aching heart,
My dear Isildria must depart.

lines.name: Atziri's Splendour

implicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Vaal Skill Gems

lines.flavourText:
"When you have nothing to hide,
you have nothing to fear."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: The Beast Fur Shawl
lines.flavourText:
The quickest way to understand
your own strengths and weaknesses
is to walk in the skin of another.

lines.name: Replica Abyssus

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 40 to 75 Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds 30 to 65 Cold Damage to Attacks
Adds 10 to 130 Lightning Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"While Prototype #3 does imbue its wearer with strength to match the original,
the first researcher to don it burst into flames when he walked into sunlight..."

lines.name: Craiceann's Carapace

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Crab Skill
Bleeding cannot be inflicted on you
+5 to Maximum number of Crab Barriers

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Deep was the First of All.
It was He who conquered the waves,
who stood guard as land rose from sea.

lines.name: Bronn's Lithe

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Movement Gems
15% increased Attack and Cast Speed if you've used a Movement Skill Recently

lines.flavourText:
Forget your kite shield. Just put the biggest man
 in the field between you and the archers.

lines.name: Incandescent Heart

explicitModifiers.text: (0.8-1)% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Gain (10-20)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
25% of Elemental Damage from Hits taken as Chaos Damage
Light Radius is based on Energy Shield instead of Life

lines.flavourText:
Only light may banish the shadows from this land
And the black lies wrapped around your heart

lines.name: Kintsugi

explicitModifiers.text: 20% less Damage taken if you have not been Hit Recently
50% increased Evasion Rating if you have been Hit Recently

lines.flavourText:
Do not hide your flaws, your cracks,
mend them, and display them proudly.
For it is these that set us apart.

lines.name: Lightning Coil

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (20-30) Lightning Damage to Attacks
30% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText:
"There's nothing like imminent death
to galvanize one's purpose in life."
- Malachai the Soulless.

lines.name: Vis Mortis

explicitModifiers.text: Minions gain (15-20)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
Reap what others have sown
Muster them from their graves
Parade them for your pleasure
Zealots in mortis enslaved

lines.name: Voll's Protector

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Power Charge for each Enemy you hit with a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Although a great leader during the war,
Voll proved disastrous in times of peace.

lines.name: Atziri's Splendour

implicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Vaal Skill Gems

lines.flavourText:
"When you have nothing to hide,
you have nothing to fear."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Gruthkul's Pelt
lines.flavourText: Simple is the life of the bear.

lines.name: Doedre's Skin

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Blasphemy

Grants Level 20 Summon Doedre's Effigy Skill
Socketed Hex Curse Skills are Triggered by Doedre's Effigy when Summoned
Hexes from Socketed Skills can apply 5 additional Curses

lines.flavourText:
As she was sentenced to death, Doedre was silent.
As she was tied to the stake, Doedre was silent.
As the flames licked away her life, Doedre was silent.
But Wraeclast had not heard the last of her.

lines.name: Chains of Command

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Animate Guardian's Weapon when Animated Guardian Kills an Enemy
10% chance to Trigger Level 18 Animate Guardian's Weapon when Animated Weapon Kills an Enemy
Animated Guardian deals 5% increased Damage per Animated Weapon
Animated Minions' Melee Attacks deal Splash Damage to surrounding targets
Animated Minions' Melee Attacks deal 50% less Damage to surrounding targets

lines.flavourText:
A general may carry his men to greatness, 
or be dragged beneath the mire by their burden.

lines.name: The Devouring Diadem

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems have 25% increased Reservation Efficiency
Trigger Level 15 Feast of Flesh every 5 seconds
Trigger Socketed Spells when you Focus, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
(10-12)% chance to Avoid Elemental Damage from Hits during Soul Gain Prevention
(161-180)% increased Duration of Ailments you inflict while Focused
10% chance for Energy Shield Recharge to start when you use a Skill
Focus has (5-8)% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate

lines.flavourText: The spirit hungers for the flesh.

lines.name: Crown of the Inward Eye

explicitModifiers.text: (9-21)% increased maximum Life, Mana and Global Energy Shield

lines.flavourText: Divinity is not the only path to enlightenment.

lines.name: Replica Stampede

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Travel Skills deal 80% more Damage
(30-40)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate while moving
Your Movement Speed is 150% of its base value

lines.name: Replica Eternity Shroud

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Shade Form when Hit
Gain (3-5)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage per Elder Item Equipped
Hits ignore Enemy Monster Chaos Resistance if all Equipped Items are Elder Items

lines.flavourText:
"The form of this replica came to me in a troubled dream.
I do not believe we should ever allow it to be used."
- Researcher Arn

lines.name: The Eternity Shroud

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Glimpse of Eternity when Hit
Gain (3-5)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage per Shaper Item Equipped
Hits ignore Enemy Monster Chaos Resistance if all Equipped Items are Shaper Items

lines.flavourText: There can be no defence against the celestial siblings entropy and time.

lines.name: Craiceann's Tracks

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot be Stunned if you have at least 10 Crab Barriers
You only lose (5-7) Crab Barriers when you take Physical Damage from a Hit

lines.flavourText:
When the land rose above the sea, The First of the Deep did not move.
When the sky turned to fire, The First of the Deep did not perish.
We must remember our place, and play to our strengths.

lines.name: The Ivory Tower

explicitModifiers.text: +30 to maximum Energy Shield per 100 Reserved Life
Regenerate 2% of Energy Shield per second
Chaos Damage is taken from Mana before Life

lines.flavourText: The mind is a filter through which anarchy becomes order.

lines.name: Magna Eclipsis

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 20 Elemental Aegis when Equipped
+(80-100) to Evasion Rating and Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Lunaris crossed silently, shining and full, 
Softly night left her, alone and forlorn.
Solaris rose to meet her, feeling her pull.
'Neath the midday sun, the night was reborn.

lines.name: Craiceann's Chitin

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot lose Crab Barriers if you have lost Crab Barriers Recently
+(3-5)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while you have at least (5-10) Crab Barriers

lines.flavourText:
When the rains come, we cower beneath shelter.
The First of the Deep teaches us
that we should seek no shelter but ourselves.

lines.name: Replica Ambu's Charge

explicitModifiers.text: Share Endurance Charges with nearby party members
Gain an Endurance Charge when you are Hit
Lose 2% of Life per second if you have been Hit Recently

lines.flavourText:
"Prototype #7 achieved even greater injury responsiveness than expected,
though at considerable cost to the long-term survival rate of the user."

lines.name: Thousand Ribbons

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 5 Elemental Proliferation
Adds 2 to 3 Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds 2 to 3 Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds 1 to 4 Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText:
The night of a thousand ribbons
To remember the day of a thousand flames
When Sarn burned
And was born again

lines.name: Replica Kaom's Heart
lines.flavourText:
"Useless for our purposes, but perhaps we can sell Prototype #5
to an archmage to fund other experiments."

lines.name: Ambu's Charge

explicitModifiers.text: Gain an Endurance Charge when you take a Critical Strike
Share Endurance Charges with nearby party members
Regenerate 2% of Life per second if you have been Hit Recently

lines.flavourText: Nothing stops the pain like a courageous rush into battle.

lines.name: Atziri's Acuity

explicitModifiers.text: You have Vaal Pact if you've dealt a Critical Strike Recently

lines.flavourText:
"The heart is the herald. 
It will tell me when it is best to strike."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Craiceann's Pincers

explicitModifiers.text:
10% chance that if you would gain a Crab Barrier, you instead gain up to
your maximum number of Crab Barriers

lines.flavourText:
The stone that stays in the waves soon crumbles to sand.
The First of the Deep teaches us to watch the tides
and choose our moments to move wisely.

lines.name: Ashrend

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Added Fire Damage
(10-15)% increased Physical Damage with Ranged Weapons
-(7-5) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText: The blasted oak stands forever.

lines.name: Cloak of Defiance

explicitModifiers.text: 10% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life

lines.flavourText:
When the throat roars,
As eyes weep,
When the hand grips hard
With trembling fingers,
When belly twists
Yet legs stand strong,
That is the work
Of the Defiant Heart.

lines.name: Daresso's Defiance

explicitModifiers.text: (0.4-0.6)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You lose all Endurance Charges when Hit
You gain an Endurance Charge on Kill
You gain Onslaught for 5 seconds per Endurance Charge when Hit

lines.flavourText:
"When your back is against the wall,
And your opponent is bleeding you dry,
There is only one appropriate response:
Unbridled, overwhelming violence."
- Daresso, the Sword King

lines.name: Skin of the Loyal
Atziri's Step
lines.flavourText:
"Those who dance are considered insane 
by those who cannot hear the music."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Carcass Jack
lines.flavourText:
"...The discomfort shown by the others is amusing, but none
can deny that my work has made quite the splash..."
- Maligaro's Journal

lines.name: Cloak of Flame

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 15 Fire Damage to Melee Attackers
20% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Fire Damage

lines.flavourText: He who sows an ember shall reap an inferno.

lines.name: Foxshade

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 5 to 12 Physical Damage to Attacks
+500 to Evasion Rating while on Full Life

lines.flavourText: To catch an animal, think like an animal.

lines.name: Icetomb
lines.flavourText:
When Solaris closes her burning eye
At the end of time,
the world will perish in ice.

lines.name: Infernal Mantle

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Fire Gems
15% of Fire Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
15% increased Spell Damage taken when on Low Mana

lines.flavourText:
Despair hums, softly, deadly, in the bones of my enemies. 
Eyes will burn, and souls wither, as they bask in my radiance.

lines.name: Kingsguard

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 100 Life when you lose an Endurance Charge

lines.flavourText: The toughest armour is the trust of your people.

lines.name: Prism Guardian

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems Cost and Reserve Life instead of Mana
Socketed Gems have 30% increased Reservation Efficiency

lines.flavourText: When blood is paid, the weak think twice.

lines.name: Queen of the Forest

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Movement Speed per 600 Evasion Rating, up to 75%
-(50-40) Physical Damage taken from Hits by Animals

lines.flavourText:
Shedding away her regal past, 
she forged a new destiny. 
Sacrificing the ephemeral joys of man, 
she embraced the eternal grasp of nature. 
Seizing her one true wish, 
she found peace at last.

lines.name: Shavronne's Wrappings

explicitModifiers.text: 10% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge
Reflects 1 to 250 Lightning Damage to Melee Attackers
Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Shavronne's apparel became ever more extravagant
as her body and soul became ever more corrupted.

lines.name: Solaris Lorica

explicitModifiers.text: 25% reduced Chaos Damage taken over time
Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Give me neither havens nor solace;
They are for the weak and frightened.
Instead, light the path to greatness,
So that I may begin my bright pursuit.

lines.name: The Rat Cage

explicitModifiers.text: 10% of Fire Damage from Hits taken as Physical Damage

lines.flavourText:
The truth lies inside every man, if you dig around. 
Many a confession was found in the bowels of Axiom.

lines.name: The Restless Ward

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
Regenerate (20-30) Life per second per Endurance Charge
100% increased Endurance, Frenzy and Power Charge Duration

lines.flavourText:
Use the dead to stave off death,
An armour of bones and rot.
Hanging on with bated breath,
One lapse and all for naught.

lines.name: Light of Lunaris

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (35-39) to (54-60) Cold Damage to Spells
(60-80)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
+1% to Critical Strike Multiplier per 1% Chance to Block Attack Damage
+25% to Critical Strike Multiplier if you've dealt a Non-Critical Strike Recently

lines.flavourText: Without night, there can be no day.

lines.name: Zahndethus' Cassock

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 40 Lightning Damage to Attacks
100% chance to create Consecrated Ground when you Block

lines.flavourText:
When dead men rise and darkness falls
Only faith can be your walls
Walls of Light, not of brick
Twice as strong and twice as thick

lines.name: The Formless Inferno

explicitModifiers.text: 8% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Fire Damage
Armour is increased by Overcapped Fire Resistance

lines.flavourText: He burns us to keep us from harm.

lines.name: The Snowblind Grace

explicitModifiers.text: Evasion Rating is increased by Overcapped Cold Resistance

lines.name: Gruthkul's Pelt
lines.flavourText: Simple is the life of the bear.

lines.name: The Tempest's Binding

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 18 Ice Bite
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 18 Innervate
Grants Summon Harbinger of Storms Skill

lines.name: Dialla's Malefaction

explicitModifiers.text: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +1 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +10% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 25% increased Experience

lines.flavourText:
He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
I did it for love.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

lines.name: Inpulsa's Broken Heart

explicitModifiers.text: (20-50)% increased Damage if you have Shocked an Enemy Recently

Shocked Enemies you Kill Explode, dealing 5% of
their Life as Lightning Damage which cannot Shock

lines.flavourText:
Don't hesitate; bring death to all, conclusively and swiftly,
or they will give you the same treatment.

lines.name: Asenath's Chant

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger a Socketed Spell when you Attack with a Bow, with a 0.3 second Cooldown

lines.flavourText:
Asenath loosed arrows with almost musical rhythm,
a rhythm matched by her nearly inaudible whispers,
and the crunch of the dead hitting the dust.

lines.name: Doryani's Delusion

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 25 Purity of Fire Skill
Grants Level 25 Purity of Lightning Skill
Grants Level 25 Purity of Ice Skill
Adds (25-30) to (40-45) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (1-3) to (68-72) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (25-30) to (40-45) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"Every day we choose safety or knowledge. 
Live and stagnate, or risk death for truth.
I would rather see the end of the Vaal
than help it tread water." 
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Doryani's Delusion

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 25 Purity of Fire Skill
Grants Level 25 Purity of Ice Skill
Grants Level 25 Purity of Lightning Skill
Adds (25-30) to (40-45) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (1-3) to (68-72) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (25-30) to (40-45) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"Every day we choose safety or knowledge. 
Live and stagnate, or risk death for truth.
I would rather see the end of the Vaal
than help it tread water." 
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Sporeguard

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Contaminate when you Kill an Enemy
Enemies on Fungal Ground you Kill Explode, dealing 5% of their Life as Chaos Damage
You have Fungal Ground around you while stationary

lines.name: Perfidy

explicitModifiers.text: You can have two different Banners at the same time
Banners you are carrying gain 1 Stage on Melee Hit, up to 5 per second
War Banner has (111-196)% increased Adrenaline duration
Defiance Banner has (103-197)% increased Taunt duration
Dread Banner grants an additional +(2-4) to maximum Fortification when placing the Banner

lines.flavourText:
The Trickster God turned the very Day and Night against each other.
What hope have you?

lines.name: Gravebind

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby Enemies Killed by anyone count as being Killed by you instead

lines.flavourText:
Try as you like to hide the
blood on your hands.
You'll still know the truth.

lines.name: Replica Perfect Form

explicitModifiers.text: Evasion Rating is increased by Overcapped Cold Resistance
Flesh and Stone has no Reservation

lines.flavourText:
"Test subject battered through the hatch with her bare hands,
forcing us to resort to threatening her children to restore containment."

lines.name: Goldwyrm
lines.flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

lines.name: Replica Atziri's Acuity

explicitModifiers.text: You have Perfect Agony if you've dealt a Critical Strike recently

lines.flavourText:
"One of our researchers cut himself on Prototype #2,
and he has not stopped screaming for months..."

lines.name: Belly of the Beast
lines.flavourText:
There is no safer place
Than the Belly of the Beast

lines.name: Bramblejack

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 2 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks
-2 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
40% of Melee Physical Damage taken reflected to Attacker

lines.flavourText: It is safer to be feared than to be loved.

lines.name: Lightbane Raiment

explicitModifiers.text: 30% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Reflects 30 Chaos Damage to Melee Attackers
100% chance to create Desecrated Ground when you Block

lines.flavourText:
. . . and the Light faded and hope waned
Zahndethus cast aside his faith
and embraced the darkness.

lines.name: The Fracturing Spinner

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (7-9) to (13-16) Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Summon Harbinger of Directions Skill
Adds (19-22) to (30-35) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (19-22) to (30-35) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.name: Tombfist

explicitModifiers.text: With a Murderous Eye Jewel Socketed, Intimidate Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit with Attacks
With a Searching Eye Jewel Socketed, Maim Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit with Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"Ever watched a man crush another man's skull?
Hard to feel hope after that."

lines.name: Cowl of the Thermophile

explicitModifiers.text: Can have a second Enchantment Modifier

lines.flavourText:
The villagers seared the blight with fire, but it only spread like dancing flames.

<default>{This item can be anointed by Cassia}

lines.name: Replica Mistwall

explicitModifiers.text: +75% Chance to Block Spell Damage if you have not Blocked Recently
+(8-15)% chance to Avoid Physical Damage from Hits while Phasing
You have Phasing if you have Blocked Recently

lines.flavourText:
"For personal defence, Prototype #444 is fantastic. It is one hundred percent
effective seventy five percent of the time... once." 
- Lead Researcher Ksaret

lines.name: Replica Tukohama's Fortress

explicitModifiers.text: You can Cast an additional Brand
20% increased Critical Strike Chance per Brand

lines.flavourText:
"As one of our few creations that did not cost any fatalities,
Prototype #10 bore unexpectedly positive results."

lines.name: Hyrri's Demise

implicitModifiers.text: +(6-8) Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: +(2-3) Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks
Adds 1 to 2 Cold Damage to Attacks per 10 Dexterity
Adds 1 to 2 Fire Damage to Attacks per 10 Strength
Adds 0 to 3 Lightning Damage to Attacks per 10 Intelligence

lines.flavourText:
Hyrri's quick thinking led to victory,
but it came at the cost of respect.

lines.name: Replica Eternity Shroud

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Shade Form when Hit
Gain (3-5)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage per Elder Item Equipped
Hits ignore Enemy Monster Chaos Resistance if all Equipped Items are Elder Items

lines.flavourText:
"The form of this replica came to me in a troubled dream.
I do not believe we should ever allow it to be used."
- Researcher Arn

lines.name: Faithguard

explicitModifiers.text: Increases and Reductions to Maximum Energy Shield instead apply to Ward

lines.flavourText: The priests of the Kalguur worshipped knowledge, not gods.

lines.name: Maligaro's Virtuosity
lines.flavourText:
Maligaro operated effortlessly,
with great speed and terrible consequences.

lines.name: Esh's Visage

explicitModifiers.text: Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield while not on Low Life
Reflect Shocks applied to you to all Nearby Enemies

lines.name: The Red Trail

explicitModifiers.text: 10% additional Physical Damage Reduction while stationary
Gain a Frenzy Charge on Hit while Bleeding
50% chance to be inflicted with Bleeding when Hit by an Attack

lines.flavourText:
We leave a trail, that we may know
where never we will return.

lines.name: The Unshattered Will

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Summon Harbinger of Focus Skill

lines.flavourText:
<<HBGAh>><<HBG01>><<HBGAe>><<HBG00>><<HBGAp>>

<<HBGAa>><<HBG01>><<HBGAs>><<HBG00>><<HBG04>><<HBGAt>>

lines.name: The Iron Fortress

explicitModifiers.text: +1% Chance to Block Attack Damage per 50 Strength
Chance to Block Spell Damage is Unlucky

Strength's Damage Bonus instead grants 3% increased Melee
Physical Damage per 10 Strength

lines.flavourText:
"Stand steadfast in the face of destruction.
The Council cannot afford to falter."
- Mauritius, the Iron Heart

lines.name: Replica Victario's Charity

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills
5% chance to grant an Endurance Charge to nearby Allies on Hit
10% chance to grant a Frenzy Charge to nearby Allies on Kill

lines.flavourText:
"Close to the original, and perhaps even more useful. However,
close is not what we are looking for. Keep trying." 
- Administrator Qotra

lines.name: Replica Voidwalker

explicitModifiers.text: You have Phasing if you've Killed Recently
Projectiles Chain +1 times while you have Phasing

lines.flavourText:
"Test subject was able to walk into the walls of his chamber after breaking a rabbit's neck.
He was not fast enough, however. Suggest we begin excavation to retrieve prototype."

lines.name: Atziri's Splendour

implicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Vaal Skill Gems

lines.flavourText:
"When you have nothing to hide,
you have nothing to fear."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Kaom's Heart
lines.flavourText:
The warrior who
fears will fall.

lines.name: The Brass Dome

explicitModifiers.text: Strength provides no bonus to Maximum Life
Take no Extra Damage from Critical Strikes

lines.flavourText: The turtle's shell one day becomes its tomb.

lines.name: The Anticipation
lines.flavourText:
We are within her reach,
and when the time is right,
she will reach into us.

<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Uul-Netol}

lines.name: Saqawal's Nest

explicitModifiers.text: (12-20)% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
100% increased Aspect of the Avian Buff Effect
Aspect of the Avian also grants Avian's Might and Avian's Flight to nearby Allies
+(120-150) to Evasion Rating and Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Sky was the Last of the First.
It was he who showed us that our limits are self-imposed,
that what we take for law may just be an illusion.

lines.name: Fenumus' Weave

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Spider Skill
(40-60)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Enemies affected by 3 Spider's Webs
Adds (8-10) to (13-15) Chaos Damage for each Spider's Web on the Enemy

lines.flavourText:
A burden shared is a burden made lighter.
The First of the Night teaches us that our burdens 
are not just ours to bear, but ours to use against oppressors.

lines.name: The Eternity Shroud

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Glimpse of Eternity when Hit
Gain (3-5)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage per Shaper Item Equipped
Hits ignore Enemy Monster Chaos Resistance if all Equipped Items are Shaper Items

lines.flavourText: There can be no defence against the celestial siblings entropy and time.

lines.name: Legacy of Fury

explicitModifiers.text:
(30-40)% chance when you Kill a Scorched Enemy to Burn Each surrounding
Enemy for 4 seconds, dealing 8% of the Killed Enemy's Life as Fire Damage per second

lines.flavourText:
All that was loved, all that was hated -
naught remains but ash.

When belly twists
